description:
3/8\" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Black warp. 3/8-5/8\" strips of white leather and silver metallic covered cord separated by thinner srands of metallic cord weft. .50\" of black woven weft at top before leather begins. Stapls to 11 x 8.50\" card with 
99.1 1012.19.  \"H-3\" printed on card. (black, white, silver)
title: Leather Cloth
